name: The Alabama challenge: Bar room brawl
name_original: The Alabama challenge: Bar room brawl
description:
fight for a place in the bama explorer force so you can be able to finally unite against those pesky Floridians less then a mile away.

In case it is not  obvious this is my first game it lacks a lot of polish and is in no way revolutionary but I would still like discussion for so I can do better with my next one.
